commentBody:
Can we just start the regular season with the playoffs. That's when I'll start watching. Regular season is an extended bad joke. We know who'll be in the finals. But the owners and advertisers must feed their greed.
Hey KD why didn't you sign with the Knicks?
Yeah, I know, you don't like knucklehead owners. Good luck in Golden State, not that you'll need it.

replies.commentBody: Can't help but wonder if Curry would have been injured twice had the season been 10 games shorter. They keep lengthening the playoffs without the compensating shortening of the regular season....
